content.rendered:
Our school is supported by a wonderful and vibrant Parent-Teacher Association (PTA). Our PTA supports several family events throughout the year such as Grandparent’s Luncheon, Pasta Dinner Night, Bingo Night and several more special occasions. For more information about the PTA, please contact PTA president, Angie Schlansker.

If you should have any questions regarding the PTA, please feel free to email the executive team at any time using this address: carolinestreetpta.membershiptoolkit.com

The Caroline Street Executive Team:

  • Melissa Tobrocke, Co-President
  • Angie Schlansker, Vice President
  • Katie Wisniewsk, Treasurer
  • Madeline Patterson, Secretary
  • Madeline Patterson & Rachell Ucellini, Class Parent Chairs

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/carolinestreetesptso
Remind: http://www.remind.com/join/carolinest
